0.4.name: wordpress/world-cup-predictor
0.4.description:
This plugin is designed to collect users predictions for each of the matches in the 2010 FIFA World Cup.

Users predict the score for each World Cup match in the group and knockout stages and are awarded points based on the accuracy of their prediction.

Match results may also be displayed using this plugin.

Note: This plugin has been retired and is no longer supported

Please see Euro 2012 Predictor plugin

New in V1.2

Ability for users to toggle match kickoff times between South African and browser local time. Manually order Group tables in the event that FIFA draw lots. Countdown timer message can be customized to use local language conventions. Display all users predictions for all matches with one shortcode.

Features

  • easy adding of matches, venues, results
  • entry form
